snippet: “Fed Up,” whose backers include Katie Couric and Laurie David, hopes to organize town hall meetings as part of its argument that food companies have misled consumers.
abstract: “Fed Up,” whose backers include Katie Couric and Laurie David, hopes to organize town hall meetings as part of its argument that food companies have misled consumers.

headline.main: Sundance: A Food Documentary That Hopes to Start a Movement
